EmailTemplate.subject: Consider These 5 Must-Haves for a Grocery eCommerce Solution
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We all know the old way of grocery shopping isn’t likely to make a comeback. That’s actually a good thing for retailers, as long as the right solutions are in place to accommodate the surge in online shopping traffic. Read more on these 5 must-haves with an eCommerce solution: - Control of your own branding - Management of your customer experiences - Superior service without huge costs - Scalable software - A mobile solution that understands your business’s needs Before investing in a reliable eCommerce solution to run your store from end-to-end, make sure it has these five essential features.
